info.description: Imperial Mandate Urgot build for ARAM that's all about slowing and disrupting fights.
how it works: This build is all about Imperial Mandate.
You support through disrupting fights, being annoying, Slowing/Healing/Buffing and soaking damage.
how to play: You rush Rylai's Crystal Scepter, then Imperial Mandate.
Your slows trigger Font of Life AND Imperial Mandate, healing and buffing your allies.
Remember that you need to keep close to your allies to trigger Guardian.

Since LoL Patch 14.1 Imperial Mandate is changed. Now you need your team to proc it to deal any damage. So you need to play a little bit differently. Do not spam mindlessly. Try coordinating it with your team - when they are about to poke or when they go in.
Font of Life heal can trigger various support items, like Ardent Censer or Staff of Flowing Water or even Moonstone Renewer!
You need to adapt your items to the game. Enemy team heavy on AP? Buy MR. They heavy on AD? Buy Armor. You need some damage? Well buy that.
how it works champion: This build is about applying AOE slow constantly with W + Passive + Rylai's Crystal Scepter (more universal option). You can even get Serylda's Grudge and Iceborn Gauntlet for more consistency. It is all about proccing Imperial Mandate and Font of Life - dealing damage, buffing your allies and healing them.
how to play champion: Another good rune is Grasp of the Undying.
tricks champion: R + Flash combo: After you hit Fear Beyond Death (R), you can R into enemy team for AoE Fear. The crucial aspect of this combo is timing: Flash into an enemy team at the very end of animation, this way they cannot react.
tricks champion riot: Pay attention to your individual leg's cooldowns, as they make for a signficiant portion of your damage
Land Corrosive Charge or Disdain to lock on to target's with Purge - a great way to trigger multiple legs in rapid succession.
Save Fear Beyond Death for opponents you know are already too weak to survive. It's especially good for picking off fleeing foes.

tooltip: Ardent Censer - buy it if you have auto attackers in your team.
Staff of Flowing Water - your Font of Life heal will trigger it, universal, even better if you have AP on your team.
Redemption - universal item, if you need sustain or anti-poke.
Moonstone Renewer - kind of universal item, if your team members actually use auto attacks on your slowed targets. Check your Font of Life value around ~10 min mark to see if it is worth it.
Shurelya's Battlesong - universal item, for engaging or for running away.
Locket of the Iron Solari - universal item, for anti-poke.
If you feel like it's going to be last fight:
Elixir of Iron - for more survivability and vs CC.
Seeker's Armguard - one time use that can win a fight.
